data.event: David Burliuk’s ‘Portrait of Professor Nicholas K. Roerich’ (1929) is one of the items displayed.
The idea came from a 2003 exhibition of Russians who emigrated to France.
Museum at the University of Oklahoma this spring, and will return to San Diego after a two-month run at Moscow’s Tretyakov Gallery this summer.

“American Artists from the Russian Empire” runs through June at the State Russian Museum, 4 Inzhenernaya Ulitsa, M: Gostiny Dvor.
